title: Forty Mile Claim: A Queer Tale of the Great White North
description: 1900, Yukon Territory, Canada. Drawn together by forbidden desires, a criminal and a mountie must negotiate for their freedom...either from each other, or together. Jack McKay just wanted to smuggle whiskey and get paid. He never counted on running into buttoned down, yet powerfully magnetic Marc Leclerc. Their first night together shocks both men to the core.From two different worlds, Jack and Marc cannot resist each other - but their pasts and the law will never allow them to be together. Are they strong enough to defy their circumstances? Or will the unforgiving Canadian wilderness devour them whole?
author: L.M. Giffard
